content.question:
Capture and paste a code segment from your program that you developed during the administration of this task.

Your code segment must contain selection.

frqParts.text:
Capture and paste a code segment from your program that you developed during the administration of this task.

Your code segment must contain selection.

Provide a written response that:

(Approx. 100 words, exclusive of program code)

describes two inputs for your program,
describes the true and false conditions for the selection statement, and
identifies the result of each condition.

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Identify and correct errors in algorithms and programs, including error discovery through testing.
